House Bill/Resolution NO. HB09176
FULL TITLE : AN ACT CREATING THE DEPARTMENT OF WATER, IRRIGATION, SEWAGE, FLOOD CONTROL, AND SANITATION RESOURCE MANAGEMENT, DEFINING ITS POWERS AND FUNCTIONS, APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Aims to improve our waters by: ensuring and improving the country's sustainable community-based water sources; protection of watersheds and water sources; lending program to Local Water Districts; sewage and sanitation resource management; as well as flood control and flood risk management. Seeks to better manage the entire cycle of our water - from sourcing to water treatment and sewage to achieve more sustainable water supply and better overall management of our irrigation, sanitation, flood management, and sewage.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CUA, DAKILA CARLO E.
DATE FILED : 2019-04-04
